summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Hi, I'm Nguyen Lam Truong, a dedicated FullStack Developer with 2 years of experience in JavaScript, specializing in backend development using React, Node.js, Express, and Sequelize, SQL, mySQL. Proficient in RESTful API design and microservice architecture. Skilled in optimizing code for readability, reusability, and scalability. Passionate about continuously learning and contributing to a dynamic, professional environment.
summary.address: Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam
